title: my google pixel 2016 won't turn on i power off that by holding power button for 10 seconds
content: My pixel wont turn on after i power off the phone and u have tried to charge but nothing shows up for last 2 3 days its keep hanging for 2 minutes especially when i watch some videos now please help me out here or else i will never buy pixel phone i can understand its 2016 model but that does not mean that it crashes for no reason.
